p: The age groups and genders of all the samples included in this study were compared to positive HMPV cases. It was observed that severe acute respiratory infections had a greater percentage among the age group from 29 days to 12 months. HMPV positive samples also predominantly belonged to this age group. Males and females presented with 51.3% (3739) and 48.7% (3544), respectively, of the total samples. For the HMPV positive samples, 45% (149) were males and 55% (182) were females ( Table 1).
